ActEmergency Management Act
SubjectOrder No. 158 - (Prince Edward Island) Provincial Emergency Financial Assistance Order
PrecisPROVINCIAL EMERGENCY FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE ORDER NO. 158 which makes a declaration of federal concern and authorizes the federal government to provide financial assistance to the province of PRINCE EDWARD ISLAND with respect to the STORM which affected the province from December 20 to 22, 2012, inclusive.
AttachmentsAttachment
